author: Source: Channel3000
title: John Goodman shows off weight loss on red carpet - Channel3000
text:
John Goodman took to the red carpet in London on Thursday to promote his new movie while also showing off his newly slimmed-down look. Goodman's appearance at the British premiere of "Trumbo" at the BFI London Film Festival was just the latest glimpse of his recent weight loss.
Start the conversation, or Read more at Channel3000.
